General.Name: Seohee Construction Co. Ltd
General.Description: Seohee Construction Co., Ltd. operates as a construction company primarily in South Korea. The company primarily undertakes housing, implementation, redevelopment/reconstruction, officetel, public apartment, civil engineering, and environment projects, as well as other private contracts. It also invests in environmental projects for the environment preservation and development of new renewable energy. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
